description: The procedure JIBSOJHJKNCHK reads address‑change records from the temporary staging table JIBWJUSHOHENKO_TMP using a SELECT cursor.
During validation, any record that fails business rules is written to the error table JIBTJUSHOHENKO_JKN_ERR with an INSERT statement.
Records that pass all validation checks are inserted into the work table JIBWJUSHOHENKO_KEY for later duplicate‑key checking.
The procedure uses SELECT statements with WHERE clauses to look up reference data (e.g., code tables) for type, length, and existence validation.

JIBSOJHJKNCHK orchestrates the end‑to‑end workflow: truncate target tables, extract source rows, validate each field, insert clean rows into JIBWJUSHOHENKO_KEY, and log errors into JIBTJUSHOHENKO_JKN_ERR.
